description: This is an example configuration file. You can use this as a template for creating your own configuration file.

accessories.name: SWITCH NAME

accessories.json_path: OPTIONAL IF MQTT MESSAGE NEEDS JSON PARSING USE THIS OPTION TO SET JSON PATH EXAMPLE: some_path
accessories.caption: SWITCH LABEL

topics.statusSet: MQTT TOPIC FOR THE SETTING THE STATUS
topics.openGet: OPTIONAL MQTT TOPIC FOR THE GETTING THE STATUS OF OPEN SWITCH
topics.closedGet: OPTIONAL MQTT TOPIC FOR THE GETTING THE STATUS OF CLOSED SWITCH
topics.openValue: OPTIONAL VALUE THAT MEANS OPEN (DEFAULT true)
topics.closedValue: OPTIONAL VALUE THAT MEANS CLOSED (DEFAULT true)
